title: Allen Digital | SDE-1 | Bangalore
content:
All offer posts must follow this template:

Education: B.Tech in Computer Science (2022 passout)
Years of Experience: ~1.8 years FTE
Prior Experience: worked for an Ecommerce startup
Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Allen Digital
Title/Level: SDE-1
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 18 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: N.A.
Stock bonus: Only offered to titles greater than SSE
Bonus: 2 LPA (variable bonus)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 20 LPA
Benefits: Standard

Other details:
Learning lots of new things daily, amazing talented engineers.
Recruiter reached out to me for an interview.

title: PubMatic vs Druva | SDET2 | Pune
content:
*  **Education**: Btech CS Tier 3
* **YOE**: 2.8
* Prior Experience: Top company based in Pune
* Date of the Offer: June 2024



**Company: PubMatic**
* Title/Level: SDET-2
* Location: Pune
* Salary: 22 Lakh
* Signing Bonus: 2 lakh 
* Stock bonus: N/A
* Bonus: 2.4lakh performance bonus
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus): 26.4 lakh for first year.
* Benefits: Free food, Wifi reimbursement - 18,000


**Company: Druva**
* Title/Level: Staff SDET (Equivalent to SDET-2)
* Location: Pune
* Salary: 23 Lakh
* Signing Bonus: 2 lakh 
* Company RSU: 2628 (Paper money untill company goes public)
* Bonus: 2.2lakh performance bonus
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus): 27.2 lakh for first year.
* Benefits: Free food, Wifi reimbursement: 22,440/- Education reimbursement: 90,000/-

**Other details:**
For me priority is having good Work-life balance and job security. Any folks from Druva, can you please comment about WLB also can you tell me what is the value of RSU's and if comapny have any plans to go public in coming years? 
**Need Suggestions from the community, what should i do?**

title: Microsoft SE 2 L61 - Need Suggestion
content:
* Education: B.Tech in Computer Science (Tier-3 but a good university)
* Years of Experience: 4.5
* Current Experience:SDE 2 

Current Company

* Company : Product Based Comapny (Fintech)
* Location WFH
* Base salary :34 Lakh
* Variable: 3.4
* Joining Bonus : 3 Lakh
* 1st Year -> 42 Lakh
* TechStack - Latest Tech Stack like GoLang ,AWS ,Redis,Java

Offer :

* Company: Microsoft
* Title/Level: L61
* Location: Hyderabad
* Base Salary: 33.5 Lakh
* Annual Bonus: 20% of Base
* Signing Bonus: 5L(3L (1st Year) + 2L(2nd Year))
* Relocation bonus: ~3L +131,767.00 = 4 Lakh 31 Thousand
* Stock bonus: 100K (vesting over 4 years)
* Benefits: Standard
* TechStack- Old TechStack .Net,Java,Azure

1st Year In Hand -> 33.5 Lakh + 20.5 Lakh (Stocks) +3 Lakh +3.35 (Performance Bonus) (10%) +4 Lakh=64.35 Lakh(Gross)

Now doubt is that I have been in current company from only last 3 Months and completely wfh opportunity but Microsoft is a dream company so whether should I go for this offer ? and Techstack is also not that good in Microsoft Can someome help me here?
